Protocols/NEUPagingSegmentedControlDeleg.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specific segment is selected.

Protocols/NEUPagingSegmentedControlDeleg.name: NEUPagingSegmentedControlDelegate
Protocols/NEUPagingSegmentedControlDeleg.abstract: The protocol defines the methods to interact with the NEUPagingSegmentedControl.

Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.name: currentIndex
Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.abstract: The index of the segment that’s currently highlighted.

Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.name: delegate
Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the paging segmented control.

Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.name: segmentTitles
Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.abstract: Set up paging segments with an array of titles.

Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.name: scrollView
Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.abstract: The scroll view that moves its contents along with the indicator.

Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.name: indicatorView
Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.abstract: The indicator view below the segment titles.

Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.abstract: The color of the vertical separators between segments.

Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html#/.abstract: Initializes a paging segmented control with given parameters.

Classes/NEUPagingSegmentedControl.html.name: NEUPagingSegmentedControl
